query: SELECT ID, MUID, VersionName, VersionNumber, Version_ID, VersionFlag, Name, Code, ChangeTrackingMask, Company_Code, Company_Name, Company_ID, [Legal Number] as Legal_Number, Country_Code, Country_Name, Country_ID, Address, [ZIP Code] as ZIP_Code, City, [Legal Number Cleansed] as Legal_Number_Cleansed, [Business Partner_Code] as Business_Partner_Code, [Business Partner_Name] as Business_Partner_Name, [Business Partner_ID] as Business_Partner_ID, [Local ID] as Local_ID, Type, EnterDateTime, EnterUserName, EnterVersionNumber, LastChgDateTime, LastChgUserName, LastChgVersionNumber, ValidationStatus FROM mdm.[Business Partner Companies]
